import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import getCartAction from '../Store/Action/Get_Cart_Action' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const My_Cart = () => { const [itemAddedToCart, setitemAddedToCart] = useState() let getCartdata = useSelector(state => state.GetCartReducer?.cartItem) console.log(getCartdata) if (!localStorage.getItem("logintoken")) { getCartdata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) console.log(getCartdata) } const dispatch = useDispatch() const logintoken = localStorage.getItem("logintoken") useEffect(() => { console.log("gjhgjhjk") if (logintoken) { getCartAction(dispatch, {}) } }, [dispatch]) let arrlength = getCartdata ? getCartdata.length : "No Item" return (<>

{arrlength} item in your cart

Taxes may apply for certain state
{getCartdata?getCartdata.map((item,index)=>{return }):null}
{item?.Title} {item.Title} ₹{item?.Price?.sell_price?.$numberDecimal} ₹{item?.Price?.current_store_price?.$numberDecimal}
Total ₹ 10000
) } export default My_Cart
